channel.title: H31p
channel.description:
for my tzhaar minigame the monsters summon after you kill a monster, how do i make it so if you die or leave the caves those npc's dissapear?
also how can i make it if some body is in my caves already it doesnt let them go in. or something cuz with my servers height levels dont work...
